datasets.name: ds_fraud_kpis
datasets.query: SELECT total_transactions, approved_count, declined_count, avg_fraud_score, avg_aml_risk_score, total_transaction_value FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_executive_kpis LIMIT 1

datasets.name: ds_decline_risk
datasets.query: SELECT decline_reason, decline_count, avg_fraud_score, total_declined_value, recoverable_pct FROM __CATALOG__.__SCHEMA__.v_top_decline_reasons ORDER BY decline_count DESC
